abstract: South Korean prosecutors announce plans to charge Choi Soon-sil, longtime friend of Pres Park Geun-hye, with influence peddling, abuse of power and attempted fraud; Choi is accuses of using her influence over Park to coerce companies to donate $70 million to foundations under her control; Ahn Chong-bum, former senior aide to Park, has also been implicated.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors intend to charge Choi Soon-sil, who is at the center of a scandal engulfing President Park Geun-hye, with influence peddling and other crimes.
snippet: Prosecutors intend to charge Choi Soon-sil, who is at the center of a scandal engulfing President Park Geun-hye, with influence peddling and other crimes....

headline.main: South Korean Prosecutors Say They Will Bring Charges Against President’s Friend
headline.print_headline: Charges Planned for Friend of South Korean President
